p: The origin of SARS-CoV-2 was thought to be wild animals in the Huanan Seafood Market in Wuhan. However, not all cases have an apparent connection with the Wuhan Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market. It is evident now that SARS-CoV-2 is capable of person-person transmission. We list the major pathogenic CoVs in Table 2 for better understanding of the pathogenesis of HCoV [ 87].
